title: Designed for SMEs in the AI economy
description: A new range of workplace solutions from Canon uses artificial intelligence, cloud integration and robust security features to help businesses work more efficiently.
content: Small- and medium-size enterprises (SMEs) in Singapore are under pressure to keep up with the pace of rapid change. As work becomes more digital and driven by artificial intelligence (AI), legacy systems and manual processes are no longer enough. A 2... [5480 chars]

title: JPMorgan CEO Sees Headcount Steady Despite AI: ‘Always Redeploy’
description: JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon — weighing in amid a wave of job cuts at other employers — said headcount at the largest US bank will probably remain steady or rise as it continues to roll out artificial intelligence, if “we do a good job.”

title: AI, robotics talent empowerment to be highlighted in Parliament today

title: Apple to use Google's AI model to run new Siri, Bloomberg News reports
description: (Reuters) -Apple plans to use a 1.2 trillion-parameter artificial intelligence model developed by Alphabet's Google to help power a revamp of its Siri voice assistant, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.
content:

title: China Unveils Ambitious Plan to Weave AI Into Healthcare System
description: China Unveils Ambitious Plan to Weave AI Into Healthcare System - A new five-year directive aims to deploy artificial intelligence across the medical field, from advanced diagnostics in top hospitals to assisting doctors in rural clinics
content:
China has unveiled an ambitious national strategy to accelerate the use of artificial intelligence in healthcare, issuing a directive that sets firm targets for deploying AI from elite urban hospitals to rural clinics by the end of the decade.

title: Snap beats revenue estimates on ad boost, unveils deal with Perplexity AI
description: (Reuters) -Snap beat third-quarter revenue estimates on Wednesday and said it has partnered with Perplexity AI to integrate its artificial intelligence-powered search engine into Snapchat.
content:

title: US House lawmakers probe Delta Air Lines on use of AI in ticket pricing
description: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -A group of two dozen U.S. House Democratic lawmakers asked Delta Air Lines CEO Ed Bastian on Wednesday to answer questions about whether it will use generative artificial intelligence to help set ticket prices.
